text:
London, UK - Priory Solutions - Full Time ONSITE

------------------------------------------------

We're looking for a talented software engineer and a fantastic software analyst or product manager to join our team. We're based in Shoreditch, we're a software company, we build great products and we have a good time doing it. If you like to create software, solve problems, write code, design new things and keep on learning then get in touch.

Our stack is C#, MVC, webapi, AngularJS, SQL Server, and a little bit of lots of other things.

Software Engineer:

- http://www.indeed.co.uk/job/software-engineer-c-net-angularj...

Software Analyst / Product Manager:

- http://www.indeed.co.uk/job/systems-analyst-product-manager-...

http://priorysolutions.com/careers/

------------------------------------------------

Thanks, Rory - CTO
